reviews.review: Very good follow up. Normally part 2 of a great game is worse but this introduces new mechanics and a great story. Nothing more to add than: great!
Весьма затягивающая головоломка с интересным контекстом и развитием сюжета. Но самое клёвое в игре - мультиплеер. Можно показать друзьям своего скрытого гения:)

probably one of the best games of all time. not much else to it, really. i've replayed single chapters of it dozens of times and probably replayed the entire game at least 5 times across xbox and computer. the multiplayer is really fun and i've probably played the official maps with multiple friends just as much as i've replayed the campaign. also the multiplayers support of user generated maps is probably one of the most fun things i've ever seen/experienced with a friend in any video game.
Loved the story. Loved the mechanics. Loved the sarcasm.
that game make my brain think that math is easy compared to that but it is a really good game
Bardzo dobra gra. Lecz edytor trochę biedny. Trzeba zainstalować hammera lub w moim przypadku Beemoda żeby conajmniej mieć rzeczy z moda Aperture tag.
The best game I have ever played!
Одна из лучших игры в которые я когда либо играл.
Really fun and interesting puzzles. Atmosphere is great too. Playing community levels with friends is always fun.
très cool pour jouer avec c'est amis
Co-Op modu sarıyor hikayesi de süper. 4/5 aralıksız oynayınca sıkmaya başlıyor ama.

Die Story ist sehr Gut und einfallsreich.
Man wird auf dauer immer Kreativer sein müssen um weiter zu kommen.
Es gibt Momente wo man langsam verzweifeln kann aber es macht auf dauer sehr viel Spaß.
von mir Bekommt das spiel eine 10/10.

it's totally fun, not gonna lie
amazing game, can't get enough of it. I need more, please valve!!
Чудесный сюжет, озвучка, а особенно шутки. Ведь про мамок шутить в играх это круто! Также в кооперативе можно сыграть

Portal 2 review
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Pros:
+First-person game
+Neat continuation of portals and portal guns (is it an FPS?)
+One of the best stories i played
+End song is great
+They added Co-op so make your friends buy the game and play together!
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Cons:
-Like in CS:GO or TF2 there are microtransactions to buy clothing, some of them are too expensive
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Do I recommend Portal 2?
Yes

Do I recommend Microtransactions?
No
У этой игры очень хороший сюжет и геймплей очень рекомендую!
classic, super replayable after all these years

Very fun puzzle game. Completed the multiplayer with a good friend and had alot of fun. If you enjoy puzzle games multiplayer or singleplayer, GET THIS.

After playing Portal and Portal 2 on console, I decided to give it a chance on PC. It was the best thing i've done in a while. Good memories and an even better experience.

Mahti tarina ja mahtavia puzzleja! Peli joka tekee kaikken montakertaa paremmin kuin Portal 1 teki, eli jos pidit portal 1 niin suosittelen myös pelaamaan Portal 2. Itse arvostan tämän pelin kanssa myös sitä että peliin ollaan tehty kokonaan oma tarinansa Co-op pelimuotoon, joka on todella Awesome!

je vous conseil si vous aimer bien les jeux d'énigme

Portal 2 is a fantastic game! It takes all the concepts introduced in the first game, then multiplies it by 100. There are so many awesome ideas shoved into this game, from the fun gels to gravity manipulation, they all flesh each other out and add onto one another. They even were able to create some absolutely fantastic lore, to a game that really didn't need it. A solid 10/10, and a must play for everyone!
this is a very good game and the story to it is great
